DOC.brief_summary: A total 18 healthy volunteer participate four-week , within-groups , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . The study two phase separate 4 15-day washout period . Subjects randomly assign receive either 40 mg atomoxetine placebo . For Phase I , subject assign atomoxetine placebo 4 day . After receive medication placebo three day , subject 6-hour laboratory session , responses physical psychological stress 20 mg/70 kg ( 20 mg maximum ) dose d-amphetamine measure . Several physiological , hormonal , subjective outcome measure obtain experimental session . Subjects 4-15 day washout period cross alternative treatment Phase II .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : This pilot study examine effect norepinephrine reuptake blocker , atomoxetine , physiological subjective response physical psychological model stress oral amphetamine healthy volunteer . The physical stress model cold pressor test ( CPT ) psychological stress pace auditory serial addition task ( PASAT ) . Our overall hypothesis atomoxetine treatment , compare placebo , attenuate physiological subjective response stress d-amphetamine . 2 . Research Design : Double-blind , placebo-controlled , within-groups , outpatient study . 3 . Methodology : A total 18 healthy volunteer participate four-week , within-groups , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . The study two phase separate 4 15-day washout period . Subjects randomly assign receive either 40 mg atomoxetine placebo . For Phase I , subject assign atomoxetine placebo 4 day . After receive medication placebo three day , subject 6-hour laboratory session , responses physical psychological stress 20 mg/70 kg ( 20 mg maximum ) dose d-amphetamine measure . Several physiological , hormonal , subjective outcome measure obtain experimental session . Subjects 4-15 day washout period cross alternative treatment Phase II . 4 . Findings : A total 10 subject complete study . This study publish .
DOC.criteria: Female male , age 18 45 year Current history good health normal ECG For woman : pregnant determine pregnancy screening , breast feeding , use acceptable birth control method . History heart disease , hypertension , renal hepatic disease , glaucoma , hyperthyroidism , medical condition physician investigator deems contraindicate patient study Current use psychotropic medication ( antidepressant , antipsychotic , anxiolytic ) and/or diagnosis treatment Axis I disorder include major depression , bipolar affective disorder , schizophrenia panic disorder within past year . Current dependence alcohol drug treatment drug alcohol addiction ( amphetamine great abuse liability among drug addiction ) within past 5 year .
